title: How to Get Wither Skeleton Skulls in Minecraft: Java & Bedrock Edition

steps.title: Find a Nether Fortress.
steps.content: Find a Nether Fortress. Nether Fortresses are special structures located in the Nether. These fortresses are the only place in Minecraft where wither skeletons spawn. [1] X Research source Nether Fortresses are more likely to spawn in locations where the X-axis is positive. If you're having trouble finding a Nether Fortress, you can use the command /locate structure minecraft:nether-fortress . You can also use your world seed at www.chunkbase.com to locate Nether Fortresses in your world.

steps.title: Defeat wither skeletons.
steps.content: Defeat wither skeletons. Wither skeletons spawn within Nether Fortresses, but the chance of getting a wither skull is low. If a player character or a tamed wolf kills a wither skeleton, it has a 2.5% chance of dropping a skull. [2] X Research source While you can get wither skulls without adding Looting to your weapons, each level of Looting increases your chances of getting a wither skull. Java Edition: Each level of looting increases your chance by 1% for a maximum of 5.5% with Looting III Bedrock Edition: Each level of looting increases your chance by 2% for a maximum of 8.5% with Looting III If you kill a wither skeleton with a charged creeper, one (Java Edition) or all (Bedrock Edition) are guaranteed to drop their heads.

steps.title: Summoning the wither.
steps.content: Summoning the wither. The main use for wither skulls is to spawn the wither . You'll need three wither skulls to summon the wither , along with four blocks of soul sand and/or soul soil. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Crafting the Skull banner pattern.
steps.content: Crafting the Skull banner pattern. If you combine one paper with one wither skeleton skull, you'll get the Skull banner pattern. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Wearing as a helmet.
steps.content: Wearing as a helmet. Like other heads, you can wear the wither skeleton skull as a helmet. However, unlike other heads, wearing a wither skeleton skull as a helmet will not reduce their detection range. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Decoration.
steps.content: Decoration. Like other heads, wither skeleton skulls can be used as decoration. You can place the skulls on top of or on the side of blocks, similar to signs.
